title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Blockchain-Based Online Educational Content Evaluation System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet usage skills, experience with educational content, and foundational understanding of blockchain concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of blockchain technology and the structure of decentralized evaluation systems
Learners can form PBL teams to design and implement actual online educational content evaluation scenarios
Learners can demonstrate how to verify the integrity and transparency of evaluation data using smart contracts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
